characters.story: The sun takes the shape of sway, shouting "Hwahng!" sharply!
The white and water unite to create moor, asking "Bwo? Anchor?" curiously!
The water takes the shape of get rid of, shouting "Tigh!" sharply!
The water takes the shape of soak, singing "Jahn!" cheerfully!
Picture water beside an eye: that's insignificant, whispering "Myao" softly!
The body stands for gland, shouting "Shyan!" sharply - a vivid image to remember!
See how the earth forms level? It whispers "Tahn" softly - a vivid image to remember!
This character represents newborn, asking "Wah? Baby?" curiously!
See how the water forms bank? It asks "Yah? Riverbank?" curiously!
See how the mouth forms inch? It shouts "Tsoon!" sharply spoken through parted lips!
See how the body forms elbow? It whispers "Joh" softly - a vivid image to remember!
The fire stands for scorch, asking "Jwoh? Burn?" curiously with flickering flames dancing high!
See how the fire forms stir-fry? It sings "Chao" cheerfully!
